Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.graphics

Interface BoundsObject

All Known Subinterfaces:
SceneObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
CircleButton, CircleShape, org.jsfml.graphics.CircleShape, ConvexShape, org.jsfml.graphics.ConvexShape, Marker, Particle, RectangleButton, RectangleShape, org.jsfml.graphics.RectangleShape, Shape, Sprite, Text, VertexArray
public interface BoundsObject
Represents objects that have determinable local and global bounds.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    FloatRect
    getGlobalBounds()
    Gets the object's global bounding rectangle in the scene, taking its transformation into account.
    FloatRect
    getLocalBounds()
    Gets the object's local bounding rectangle, not taking its transformation into account.

  • Method Details

    • getLocalBounds

      FloatRect getLocalBounds()
      Gets the object's local bounding rectangle, not taking its transformation into account.
      Returns:
      the object's local bounding rectangle
      See Also:
      • Shape.getLocalBounds()
      • Sprite.getLocalBounds()
      • Text.getLocalBounds()
      • VertexArray.getLocalBounds()

    • getGlobalBounds

      FloatRect getGlobalBounds()
      Gets the object's global bounding rectangle in the scene, taking its transformation into account.
      Returns:
      the object's local bounding rectangle
      See Also:
      • Shape.getGlobalBounds()
      • Sprite.getGlobalBounds()
      • Text.getGlobalBounds()
      • VertexArray.getGlobalBounds()
